scene.name: Cup manipulation setup
scene.description: A table with three disposable cups arranged horizontally

task.name: Stack and line up cups
task.description: Sequentially stack cups into a column and then separate them into a line
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice manipulating cups. The goal is to stack the three cups one by one, and then unstack them into a line.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要进行杯子操作任务。目标是逐个将杯子叠起来，然后再拆开排成一排。

subtasks.description: Execute the detailed stacking and unstacking sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please follow the steps to stack and unstack the cups.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请按照步骤执行叠杯子和拆杯子的流程。

steps.description: Place the left cup into the center cup
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the cup on the left and place it inside the center cup.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起左边的杯子，把它套进中间的杯子里。

steps.description: Place the right cup into the stack
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: pick up the cup on the right and place it inside the stack.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：拿起右边的杯子，把它套进刚才叠好的杯子里。

steps.description: Remove the top cup and place it on the left
steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: take the top cup out and place it back on the left side.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：拿出最上面的杯子，把它放回左边。

steps.description: Remove the next cup and place it on the right
steps.spoken_prompt: Step four: take the next cup out and place it on the right side to form a line.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第四步：拿出现在的最上面的杯子，放在右边，让三个杯子排成一排。

constraints.notes: Ensure precise insertion during stacking; final alignment needs to be visually straight.
